title: Flos
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:bhl-dark-sidebar]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:bhl-style-collapse-source]]

[[module CSS]]
#page-content .unfolded-collapse {
    max-width: 100%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

.spoiler {
    background-color: transparent;
    padding: .25rem;
    color: transparent;
}
 
.spoiler:hover {
    background-color:#424248;
    color: white;
}
[[/module]]

[[div style="display: none;"]]
[[include component:image-block name=flos-thumb.png|caption=.]]
[[/div]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[div_ class="no-addendum"]]
[[div_ class="unfolded-collapse"]]
[[span style="font-family:var(--header-font); font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size) * 1.2);"]]T-minus 00:06:16[[/span]] | Site-15 Exterior, East Camera
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[=]]
[[div class="spoiler"]]
//The time is nigh, my dearest friends//
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

[[image untitled.png]]

@@@@ @@@@

//(Dr. Nadir Shahid approaches Designer Sonia Crowsworth, who is lying in the flower field by the lake.)//

**Dr. Shahid:** Crowsworth.

**Desigr. Crowsworth:** Oh! Hello there Nadir. Care to join me?

//(Crowsworth pats the spot besides her. Three seconds of silence passes.)//

**Dr. Shahid:** ...Alright.

//(Dr. Shahid sits down slowly.)//

**Desigr. Crowsworth:** So how's your son? Still planning to go to his dream college?

**Dr. Shahid:** Planning no more, he got his letter of acceptance just last week. Been negotiating with me for a new car, the little rascal.

**Desigr. Crowsworth:** I'd say he deserves it, ya dingus! And give him my congratulations.

//(Sounds of hundreds of wings flapping echo above head.)//

**Dr. Shahid:** What about you Crowsworth? Anything exciting recently?

**Desigr. Crowsworth:** Jackie wanted to go for a walk this morning! It's like my baby got new springs in her steps again. I'll let you play with her sometimes!

**Dr. Shahid:** I'm afraid your Bullmastiff might crush me, but thanks for the offer.

//(The flowers briefly become violet.)//

[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[div_ class="no-addendum"]]
[[div_ class="unfolded-collapse"]]
[[span style="font-family:var(--header-font); font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size) * 1.2);"]]T-minus 00:04:38[[/span]] | Site-19, Breakroom Camera
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[=]]
[[div class="spoiler"]]
//One day, I hope to see you again//
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

//(Various Foundation researchers and D-Classes engages in social interactions, consuming an assortment of foods and drinks.)//

//(A researcher fumbles a large bottle, accidentally spraying surrounding personnel with soda.)//

//(Everyone laughs.)//

//(A vase of orchids is set on the counter.)//

[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[div_ class="no-addendum"]]
[[div_ class="unfolded-collapse"]]
[[span style="font-family:var(--header-font); font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size) * 1.2);"]]T-minus 00:03:52[[/span]] | Site-15 Exterior, East Camera
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[=]]
[[div class="spoiler"]]
//For those who sleep in graves of the dark//
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

**Crowsworth:** -nce, I'm glad I finished all my work ahead of time.

**Shahid:** You, being productive? Am I hearing this right? What's the world coming to?

**Crowsworth:** Shut up, Nadir.

//(Crowsworth punches Shahid in the arm.)//

**Crowsworth:** I just... thought it felt right - completing them, ya know?

//(A brief moment of silence lapses.)//

**Shahid:** ...I know.

//(##A0A0A0|The weight of a million things left unsaid dissipates##.)//

//(The sky turns lavender, then darkens.)//


[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[div_ class="no-addendum"]]
[[div_ class="unfolded-collapse"]]
[[span style="font-family:var(--header-font); font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size) * 1.2);"]]T-minus 00:02:00[[/span]] | Overwatch Command
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[=]]
[[div class="spoiler"]]
//Promises of reprieve shall let you be//
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

**O5-1:** One last drink for the night, gentlemen?

//(O5-1 raises his champagne glass. The rest follows.)//

//(##878787|The light grows strong. The shadow grows long##.)//

//(Strong scents of hyacinth registered.)//

[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[div_ class="no-addendum"]]
[[div_ class="unfolded-collapse"]]
[[span style="font-family:var(--header-font); font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size) * 1.2);"]]T-minus 00:01:00[[/span]] | Site-15 Exterior, East Camera
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[=]]
[[div class="spoiler"]]
//To those who can accept the light//
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

**Sonia:** ...What's left for us, Nadir?

//(Nadir ponders. He picks a purple lily and gives it to Sonia.)//

**Nadir:** All the time in the world.

//(Sonia accepts it, and nods.)//

//(The stars' brightness increases sharply for 45 seconds.)//

@@@@
@@@@

//(##565656|Then they go out##.)//

[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[div_ class="no-addendum"]]
[[div_ class="unfolded-collapse"]]
[[span style="font-family:var(--header-font); font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size) * 1.2);"]]T-minus 00:00:10[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[=]]
[[div class="spoiler"]]
//Smile, you're going to be free//
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

//(In unity, we speak.)//

[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[div_ class="no-addendum"]]
[[div_ class="unfolded-collapse"]]
[[span style="font-family:var(--header-font); font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size) * 1.2);"]]T-minus 00:00:08[[/span]] | Site-19, Breakroom Camera
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

**Site-19 Personnel:** We secured.

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[div_ class="no-addendum"]]
[[div_ class="unfolded-collapse"]]
[[span style="font-family:var(--header-font); font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size) * 1.2);"]]T-minus 00:00:05[[/span]] | Overwatch Command
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

**O5 Council:** We contained.

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[div_ class="no-addendum"]]
[[div_ class="unfolded-collapse"]]
[[span style="font-family:var(--header-font); font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size) * 1.2);"]]T-minus 00:00:02[[/span]] | Site-15 Exterior, East Camera
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

**Sonia & Nadir:** We protected.

[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[div_ class="no-addendum"]]
[[div_ class="unfolded-collapse"]]
[[span style="font-family:var(--header-font); font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size) * 1.2);"]]T-minus 00:00:01[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[=]]
[[div class="spoiler"]]
//O death, may you be the key//
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

//(And now, we rest.)//

//(For the world has its eye on us.)//

[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[div_ class="no-addendum"]]
[[div_ class="unfolded-collapse"]]
[[span style="font-family:var(--header-font); font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size) * 1.2);"]]T-minus 00:00:00[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[=]]
[[div class="spoiler"]]
//To our victory//

//Our sanctuary//
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[image untitled2newer.png]]

@@@@ @@@@

//(And it is [[[lily-s-proposal|beautiful]]].)//

[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
